as of now no one with a cracked version can access any L.E. content unless you BUY the game..

@kickassmusicman 

disable vsync in the game...

and if you have an nvidia card like myself..go to the nvidia control panel...find the deadspace 3 exe and enable vsync through the nvidia control panel settings...I have a 2 year old laptop with Geforce 550M and I am getting 40-50fps with high settings..good luck bro...

p.s.  I'm really disappointed that the two limited editions custumes and guns are not available in any of these uploaded deadspace torrents..the deadline is the 12th to get the limited edition from origin, I might be forced to bite lol

Well hello again,I was playing the part that is called terra nova tram or something like that, I passed that part and continue passing the game,I wanted to stop playing a little while so I save and quit,then when I open the game and put load most recent checkpoint it loads the terra nova tram! help?

the save system is weird on the first chapters, if u cleared a chunk of the game, u  might have unlocked checkpoints, look on chapter selection, if not, u just gonna have to redo and play till screen says saving.

Im having something like a glitch I dont know in the part that you have to kill the monster with some harpoons, well I drag the monster to the laser and they shot but the monster is able to escape! Any idea?

put ur graphics to low(b4 u lure spider to hook lasers), i had the same issue in that part, i lower them and was able to pass that quicktime event, just keep in mind the spider will move really fast at lower graphics. 
That was the only issue  i got on that game all the other events were  fine.
it has no voices

im not sure if this was a torrent problem but when i downloaded this game my download speed showed 1.5 mgb/s when my own download speed is only 700 kb/s..a bit strange i thought...then when i started the game install my internet connection permenately disconnected,then my cpu started to red line in my cpu meter,then programs started shutting down..i thought this must be a virus so i enabled system recovery restore point..and nothing happened,viruses usually disable the recovery process...i most of my programs including norton stopped working..i had to reformat my hard drive and reinstall everthing..now all is well
